content: After fussing for hours trying to get it to work at all, and missing out on the bonus points for attending classes at the Watt grand opening, I sadly came to the conclusion that it just won't work on my older Android Samsung Note 3.
Today is the first day I can finally go to a class but I am unable to login with my droid phone. Very frustrating.
100% useless.
Can't get in-Android. I need to be able to check in for fitness classes but the app won't even let me get into the app. There is no where for a user name or password recovery.
Having the same issue as others. Crashing at home gym selection.
This app sucks!... Does not update or calculate ... boring as hell. And pretty useless! C'mon Cal fit. You can do better than this!

This app was obviously designed for apple not android. My daughter and friend have no problems with this app on Iphone but I cant even get the app past step 2 on android. Honestly in this day and age, why cant the developers fix this app?

I don't even know what the app is like because it crashes every time I try to sign up. So much for checking in and getting points or signing up for classes... the app crashes every time I try to select my home gym .
Waste of time! The app was updated December 11, 2019 and still doesn't work. I think it's stuck in the 80's. Why release an app that's not closer to 100% complete.
Just crashes, doesn't work
Can't schedule with my trainer?
Cant finish making an account after choosing my gym. See it's been a problem for a while. Still is.
Created username and password but app wouldn't verify it. I gave after multiple tries.

Garbage app doesn't even let you sign up for an account without crashing. Doesn't work well with LastPass either, because it just go back to the start screen when you switch apps. It's almost 2020 guys...
IT DOESN'T WORK! FIX IT OR STOP OFFERING IT!!😡

Terrible app. Shouldn't even be released to the public without more testing. Can't event complete my sign up. Tried more than 3 times and can never get past selecting home gym. Selecting the gym doesn't highlight the selection and then it crashes after clicking next.

I'm unable to get past step 2 in creating my membership. In reading the reviews, it seems this has been a problem for quite some time, and one would expect it would have been fixed by now. Disappointed

Tragically bad design. Was hoping to use the app to check in at the gym, but that functionality doesn't exist and the app is loaded with bugs. Crashes, doesn't acknowledge button press, and poorly laid out. Even signing up/into the app is almost impossible due to a bunch of GUI bugs that prevent you from seeing drop down menu values and button selections.
Unusable for me. Crashes everytime I try to log in.

I was told I could redeem CalFit reward perks if I installed this app. My rewards points are suppose to show in the app after login to redeem but none of my points show in the app. This app reminds me of an old style html page.
Step 3 doesn't work on account creation, cannot create an account and use it
Cannot connect my account
Step 3 when signing up isn't working
I am unable to connect my membership card to the app. Everytime I am at the 3rd step it kicks me off the app completely.
if the auto log in or finger recognizes thing was fix this would be a great app.
terrible
app is pretty terrible. never keeps you logged in either. hard to navigate. disappointing.
this app needs a lot of work. cant use all functions of the app. not able to login all the time. not able to see points colletcted
Looks like a good app if only it worked. Most links don't work. 2 stars since at least the class schedules seem to be functioning. Needs a search option
what happened to this app, used to be better. why change a good thing. the app is horrible now.
does not stay logged in
app doesn't stay logged in . There's no search feature for classes
This app needs some major fixes if they are going to keep making customers use it.

I have been pressing "Save my password" on the app login screen. But every time I use the app I still need to enter my email and password. I don't think my phone is the culprit. I wished that your app could actually save login info. It would make it very convenient to your subscribers.
A lot of bad reviews made me think about this app. However, it works just fine for me. This is way I gave 5 stars. You never know until you try.
I agree with all of the others. Not even worth the effort. Please update this app.
the app needs to be updated so it can save our username and password and stay updated with current clubs news and events. it's a good idea app but just feels it was half completed.
this app is lacking in alp areas.. constantly have to re login in.. it doesnt remeber you.. nothing special about it..

needs more searching options. i want to look for a specfic class and its not an option, id also like to search for a timeframe at all locations. i even called a few locations and they we having troubles... needs more filters
Cool app but doesn't stay logged in.
This app needs a major work. But it's ok overall.
Generic and slow.
The app freezes, logs you out every time, & will not send the link to reset password since the password continues to fail. Surprising that a big company such as this has such a horrible app.

This app needs major work. It does not remember your password and login info so you have to login every time. It doesn't work half the time. You input your info and nothing happens it just stays on the login screen. I hope they fix it soon.. Love the gym tho..
Horrible app! The remember me box doesn't work, it logs me out if my screen rotates, and the bar code doesn't scan while trying to enter the gym!
Constantly logs you out even when the Remember Me box is checked. Times out and crashes all of the time. Not user friendly.
App keeps kicking me back to login screen after 5 seconds.

It's ok. I like that I can check in without the little key card. I wish you could earn more points for personal training sessions, since we do pay extra for that. There are a lot of things I don't use the app for (kids club, vibe)
I lost my keys and had to get a new scan card but the app will not let me update this information.
Stupid won't let me get my rewards points
Previous version was more user friendly. Horrible.
Awful. Can't even sign in.

App asked for personal info. and there's no apparent way to change or delete. Terrible app. I guess they don't improve it b/c you are forced to download it as a part of CA Family Fitness. CA Family fitness is a great gym but this app reflects poorly on them.
By far the worst app ever created
I cant log in for whatever reason

I agree with the other negative reviews. This app seems to exist merely so 
California Family Fitness can have a presence on your phone, without 
offering anything sunstantive. It logs you out if you rotate the screen, 
requiring you to re-enter you user name and password, and the bar code 
check-in doesn't even work with the turnstile readers style...meaning you 
have to have an employee scan it, saving you zero time over other methods 
of checking in.

I like how for choosing gender when signing up, you have to choose either a 
mustache or lips instead of just male/female. Smh. Thanks CFF for defining 
women as lips and men as facial hair. (sarcasm).

One of the worst apps I've ever encountered. It just simply doesn't work in 
any sense. Update: holy cow, it's even worse than I thought. I can't even 
imagine how anyone would rate this app above 1 star. I'd give it zero stars 
if that were possible. This "app" (and I use that term generously) looks 
and functions like the first effort of a small child learning how to code 
for the very first time. It's inconsistent, inconvenient, and a waste of 
everyone's time. It won't stay logged in, account updates are hit-or-miss, 
and it even logs you out if your screen rotates. I've never ever heard of 
that before, and yet here it is, in its grossly dysfunctional glory.
Please bring the old app back!

Sucks. Plain and simple. Logs you out even when you select 'remember me'. 
Also logs you out when you change from portrait to landscape on the phone. 
Stupid. And the membership bar code is too wide for the screen so it can't 
be scanned when checking in. Did I say stupid? Yes. UNINSTALL.

It's technically awful. I can register for classes but only the day of, the notification doesn't even give accurate times and there's no way to unregister. Plus, it logs out often and doesn't remember me.  Seriously, whatever you paid your developers for this was WAAAAY too much.
Zero tech support for this app
Keeps logging you out...terrrrrrrible
Useless. Had to keep rebooting the app 3x until it finally logged me in, and then there was nothing to do. Links didn't work...not even sure if I clicked on legit links.
Be prepared to log in every single time and sometimes get logged out when you are browsing. Might be easier to go to the website if you're looking for class schedules!
Hate that it logs me out everytime...
Will not remember me at sign in. Complained months ago and from the comments below so have others and no change.
Horrible!! Despite reset of passwords, I can't log in 😐
App is good for booking classes but it's not working at the moment!

They really need to fix the bugs on thus app. It logs you out, the minute you take your finger off of the screen. It also does not update the check in points for each person that checks in using the app. Needs some work and the app could be great!

Just stopped working. Thought it was a password issue, so I proceeded with resetting my password. But still no luck.  Already had to deal with it logging me out and not remembering my info.    This app sucks.
Doesn't work most of the time.
Not intuitive and difficult to navigate.

Why it doesn't have a way to go straight to the daily schedule? Everytime I see it and leave the app, if I want to check it again, it's gone. It pops up again whenever it wants. Very inconvenient. Add it please
Can't get anywhere on the app. Looks me out with every screen change. Can look up schedules of fitness activities. Disappointed.
Logs me out every time. Even if my phone turns sideways. Such a pain.  Wish they would fix this
Horrible. So much better before. Always logs me out even if you check the remember me box. It even logs out if the screen rotates. Like others said...loads extremely slow. Very unfortunate.
Logs you out constantly- even just when turning the phone to landscape.
Logs out within 1 minute. Fix this
App keeps logging you out and can be very slow to load. The previous version had a better UI and seemed more polished, although it was terrible in its own way.
Same buggy issues as everyone else.
It never remembers me & doesn't recognize I'm at the gym. Today it's not even showing all of the classes offered for Laguna.
It used to save me as logged in.  I used to be able to view the class schedules with ease.  Now a complicated mess. It's a waste of time to use.
Just set up the app two days ago and it keeps logging me out. Changed my password and now I can't get in.
Was better before the update. Never knows I am at the gym, constantly logs me out can't use it as intended
Eh
